interestingcomments.content:
Sell 16-55 2.8 WR for 16mm 1.4 WR + Extras? /!/ Hey ya'll!

Dedicated fuji shooter here looking for some advice. 

I recently picked up the 16-55 2.8 new and I'm wondering if there's a better option out there for the money. 

I'm a hardcore grass is always greener person so I figured I'd post. 

I do a TON of outdoor photography, landscapes and stuff. I also shoot a ton at my church - all day stuff from worship in crazy low light, events, portraits and street stuff. 

I have an XT-1 (waiting for the XT-3 to get the XT-2) and I originally had the 35 f/2 and that was all. 

I sold that one and bought this current 16-55 which I really like, but I'm curious if it would make more sense to go with 2 primes. It's a bit heavy and I liked the smallness of fuji. This setup is still smaller than my 5dmk2 + 24-70 so I'm not unhappy. 

I'm not directly looking to switch things up, more so just talking out loud. I'm looking at the following lenses and I'm just curious if it even makes sense to entertain the idea. 

16mm 1.4 WR 
Zeiss Touit 12mm 2.8 
Fuji 35 f2
ect. 

I miss primes ya'll but this lens is a monster and shoots everything perfectly. I don't want to lose a bunch of money if I trade. 

What do I do?
